added_paradoxes.name: Inflation of Blame
added_paradoxes.summary: Prices soar, profits break records, and everyone agrees the cashier caused it.
added_paradoxes.example_quote: Greedflation is a mythâ€”just ask the companies setting the prices.
added_paradoxes.detected_pattern: Accountability shifted downward along the income gradient.

added_paradoxes.name: Invisible Worker Supply Chain
added_paradoxes.summary: Products magically appear on shelves through the power of 'logistics'.
added_paradoxes.example_quote: Robots deliver it! (Ignore the humans collapsing in warehouses.)
added_paradoxes.detected_pattern: Labor obfuscation for moral convenience and profit optics.

humor_recalibration_prompts: Ask who profits from the story version of the economy.
If invisible hands exist, whose fingerprints are on the invoice?
Translate the quarterly report into stand-up comedy; note where the audience gasps instead of laughs.
